summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of West Fifty-sixth Street from First Avenue Northwest to Second Avenue Northwest; North Fifty-sixth Street from Phinney Avenue to Greenwood Avenue; Argyle Place from Phinney Avenue to Greenwood Avenue; North and West Fifty-fifth Street from Phinney Avenue to Fourth Avenue Northwest; Woodlawn Circle from Terrace Drive to First Avenue Northwest; North and West Fifty-fourth Street from Phinney Avenue to Terrace Drive; West Fifty-fourth Street from Third Avenue Northwest to Eighth Avenue Northwest; North Fifty-third Street from Phinney Avenue to Greenwood Avenue; West Fifty-third Street from Third Avenue Northwest to Eighth Avenue Northwest; North and West Fifty-first Street from Phinney Avenue to Second Avenue Northwest; Greenwood Avenue from North Fiftieth Street to North Fifty-seventh Street; Trinity Place from North Fifty-first Street to North Fifty-fourth Street; First Avenue Northwest form West Fiftieth Street to West Fifty-sixth Street; Palatine Avenue from West Fifty-sixth Street to Ballard Place; Second Avenue Northwest from West Fiftieth Street to West Fifty-second Street; and from West Fifty-fifth Street to West Fifty-sixth Street; Terrace Drive from First Avenue Northwest to Scenic Place; Scenic Place from Third Avenue Northwest to West Fifty-fifth Street; Third Avenue Northwest from West Fifty-second Street to West Fifty-fifth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, in accordance with Resolution No. 1879 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
